metadata.title: CVE-2020-9850 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions. This issue is fixedin iOS 13.5 and iPadOS 13.5, tvOS 13.4.5, watchOS 6.2.5, Safari 13.1.1,iTunes 12.10.7 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 11.2, iCloud for Windows7.19. A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
